publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1480# Mrs Nanette Milne: Aberdeen Alcohol Support-That the Parliament commends the dedicated work of Albyn House, the Alcohol Advisory and Counselling Service and Bon Accord Befrienders in Aberdeen for providing help, advice and support to people with alcohol-related problems; recognises that alcohol abuse is a serious social problem that blights the lives of a steadily increasing number of people in Scotland; notes that these three organisations will be joining efforts to create Alcohol Support this summer; recognises the social, health and economic benefits that a secure stream of funding to alcohol support groups such as Alcohol Support would have for Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should commend the new service as an exemplar in its field.

S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Mike Rumbles*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mary Scanlon*, Murdo Fraser*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Phil Gallie*, Margaret Mitchell*

S2M-1480# Mrs Nanette Milne: Aberdeen Alcohol Support-That the Parliament commends the dedicated work of Albyn House, the Alcohol Advisory and Counselling Service and Bon Accord Befrienders in Aberdeen for providing help, advice and support to people with alcohol-related problems; recognises that alcohol abuse is a serious social problem that blights the lives of a steadily increasing number of people in Scotland; notes that these three organisations will be joining efforts to create Alcohol Support this summer; recognises the social, health and economic benefits that a secure stream of funding to alcohol support groups such as Alcohol Support would have for Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should commend the new service as an exemplar in its field. Supported by: Mike Rumbles, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Raffan, Mary Scanlon, Murdo Fraser, Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Shiona Baird, Phil Gallie, Margaret Mitchell, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Robin Harper*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Bill Aitken*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1480# Aberdeen Alcohol Support (lodged on 15 June 2004) John Swinburne*
